title: Tulsa Massacre, President Biden, Naomi Osaka, Michael Jordan and more.
itunes:title: Tulsa Massacre, President Biden, Naomi Osaka, Michael Jordan and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It is the day after (Memorial Day) and Steve is confused. The Chief Love Officer has to ask a woman that is dealing with double vision a very magical question. Mo'Nique jumped into the bonnet debate and people had something to say about it. What is up with these NBA fans!?!? Yesterday was the 100th anniversary of the Tulsa Race Massacre. The reigning US Open champion withdrew from the French Open on Sunday. Judge Joe Brown went on a rant about our VP. Michael Jordan is donating $1 million to the journalism program of Morehouse College. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve wraps the show up with 49.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
